metadata.human_readable: Prior elicitation. Language production priors on randomized batches of the data. Unconstrained framing.

pages:
Welcome to this experiment. This experiment should take a total of 15 minutes.

You will be compensated at a base rate of $15/hour for a total of $3.75, which you will receive as long as you complete the study.

We take your compensation and time seriously! The main experimenter's email for this experiment is catwong@mit.edu.

Please write this down now, and email us with your Prolific ID and the subject line Human experiment compensation for language experiment if you have problems submitting this task, or if it takes much more time than expected.

In this experiment, you will see one picture on the screen at a time, along with a text box.


Your task is to tell us about each picture.


You can write as much or as little as you think is necessary for each picture.
You will see a total of 10 pictures during the experiment. Click next to begin the experiment.
